author: cms-met
body:
This PR fixes tiny bugs, and enable the use of the smearing correction now that proper JER scale factors are available.

Fixes :
- patCaloMET access protected when running on AOD (only affects private use of scheduled mode)
- fix the computation of JER variation on data (not possible as there is no jets), bypass with the copy of the main central MET in that case.

Packages changed :
- DataFormats/PatCandidates
- PhysicsTools/PatUtils

No change of performance expected; the Type1Smeared MET collection is now properly receiving the smearing correction
title: Various small fixes on MET
